title: Yasuo Wind Wall blocks Talons Ultimate
body:
Hello , 
The wind wall completely blocks talons ultimate **no matter which way it is facing , as long as one blade hits the wall , even on the side the entire ultimate is canceled .
****** is this intended?

replies.body: Bump because yes, this is extremely annoying. My ult shouldn't be deleted if one blade touches it at max range. that's just stupid.

I find it very annoying really , i mean this is a BUG that has been out since December , well since his release anyway. 
It's been almost two months and still nothing. 
Riot please look into this

I've encountered this issue as well and made posts about it. Last time I checked Shadow Assault was coded as a single mass, hence why the entire thing is deleted if it encounters Yasuo's Wind Wall.


However, I don't believe anything will be immediately done until they retune Talon.

Issues such as:
  
* Coding Shadow Assault's projectiles to be individuals instead of a single mass.  
* A less tedious Innate.  
* Stealth synergy baked into his kit.
* Retooling Cutthroat to give much needed flexibility that doesn't force Talons to engage with it for the % damage bonus.
If I had a smurf army i would gladly bump this for visibility. Riot has been avoiding talon for some reason and it takes way to long to get anything about him fixed.
